organisation_name: INNJOY Agencia de Innovación y Desarrollo (INNJOY)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: Innjoy (Innjoy Agencia de Innovación y Desarrollo, S.L.) is a SME based in Barcelona (Spain), that promotes and facilitates human-centred innovation. Its competence areas are design-thinking, business model innovation and strategy, research and new technologies (IOT, Smart Cities and AAL). Innjoy is committed to develop innovative, sustainable and market oriented solutions; person-centered, age friendly and smart products, services and environments that enhance people’s quality of life, improve wellbeing, health and social care in Europe and create value for the stakeholders that want to leverage the opportunities presented by the rapidly rising population of ageing consumers.
relevant_communication:
- SI-Screen (AAL project) 
- DRYM (Avanza R&D project, Spain)
